definition: drive-by download (a form of malware booby-trap)/silent drive-by download
pinyin: yin3 bi4 qiang3 po4 xia4 zai4

sentences.english: It is proposed for the concealment of confidential information.
sentences.chinese: 基于相似性的搭载模型是实现信息隐蔽的一般框架。

sentences.english: The upper eyelid scar was repaired by concealing it in the supratarsal fold naturally.
sentences.chinese: 修复上睑瘢痕，使瘢痕自然隐蔽在上睑皱襞中。

sentences.english: They are solitary stalkers, ambushing prey from a hiding place.
sentences.chinese: 它们品行孤独，总是从隐蔽处突袭猎物。

sentences.english: A third floor terrace had a seven-foot privacy wall.
sentences.chinese: 三楼的阳台上有一个7英尺的隐蔽墙。

sentences.english: Smoke grenades are used for concealment while moving over open areas such as streets.
sentences.chinese: 烟幕弹用于开阔地或者街巷的隐蔽。

sentences.english: They found a sheltered inlet and anchored the boat.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现了一个隐蔽的小港，抛锚泊了船。

sentences.english: They caught up with the old Jedi in a hidden hangar.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一个隐蔽的机库里追上了这名老绝地。

sentences.english: The experiments show that the watermarking is perceptually invisible and robustable.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，水印具有良好隐蔽性和鲁棒性。

sentences.english: Wang Dayong though Ding Song's service was hidden and very hard to judge.
sentences.chinese: 王大勇认为丁松的发球具有隐蔽性，很难判断。

sentences.english: Gaobei subtle hydrocarbon reservoir is situated in northern flank of Gaoshangpu buried hill of Nanpu depression.
sentences.chinese: 高北隐蔽油气藏位于南堡凹陷高尚堡潜山北翼。

sentences.english: Instead she took me to a quiet bistro with a private table.
sentences.chinese: 她带我去了一个安静的小酒馆，找了一个隐蔽的桌子。

sentences.english: Expansion of Guerrilla Warfare and Establishment of Small, Concealed Guerrilla Base Areas in Enemy-Occupied Areas.
sentences.chinese: 发展敌占区的游击战争与创造隐蔽的小块游击根据地。

sentences.english: We should learn to fight with enemy in an overt and covert way.
sentences.chinese: 我们应学会同敌人做公开和隐蔽的斗争。
而在演讲中，填充词的隐蔽性更高，危害也更大。

sentences.english: There seemed no end to the hidden enemies at whom he raved .
sentences.chinese: 他极力反对的隐蔽的敌人似乎还没有停止活动。

sentences.english: The scene inside the shelter was dramatic beyond words.
sentences.chinese: 隐蔽所内景象的戏剧性用语言难以描述。

definition: to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to slink/to move stealthily/to advance through the water
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
